articles.title: Biblioteca

.btn-primary {
    background-color: #74a08a;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    padding: 3px 5px 3px 5px;
    margin: 0 2px 0 2px;
    border-radius: 5px; /* Rounded edges */
    border: 0px;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background-color: #8a74a0;
    color: #FFFFFF;
}
